label: logicA:finance_en
steps: [1] If the firm’s interest coverage ratio exceeds 3.0x, then the firm is deemed able to meet interest obligations.
[2] If the firm is deemed able to meet interest obligations, then the bank will approve a new term loan.
[3] For any security x, if x is a U.S. Treasury, then x is acceptable as repo collateral.
[4] Bond A is a U.S. Treasury.
[5] The firm’s interest coverage ratio exceeds 3.0x.
[6] The firm is deemed able to meet interest obligations (from [1] and [5]).
[7] The bank will approve a new term loan (from [2] and [6]).
[8] Bond A is acceptable as repo collateral (from [3] and [4]).
[9] The bank will approve a new term loan and Bond A is acceptable as repo collateral (from [7] and [8]).
